department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: beaded panel at bottom of each with tipi design and stepped pyramids on a white ground; flaps with beaded edging and 2 rows of tin cones on each legging
dimension: a: L.26-3/16 x W.10-1/2 in.; b: L.26-3/4 x W.11-1/4 in. (including fringe and flaps)
title: Pair of Woman's Leggings
